result.title: Press release 1
result.description: At least 3 press releases will be published during the project implementation: one at the kick-off meeting, one at mid-term and one for the final event. One final press review will be performed by ETA to keep track of the media coverage of all published press releases and it will be integrated in the final PEDR. Number 1 will be related to the kick-off meeting.
